scripts.deploy: npm run build-cmp && npm run build-stub && npm run build-portal && npm run convert
scripts.test: uglifyjs  polyfills/base64.polyfill.js polyfills/assign.polyfill.js cmp.js --compress sequences,dead_code,conditionals,booleans,unused,if_return,join_vars --mangle toplevel --mangle-props reserved=[__cmp,init,getVendorConsents,getConsentData,ping,getPublisherConsents,getVendorList,showConsentUi] -o cmp.test.min.js
